input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product title.

Product title:
Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design

Product specifications:
Made of 14 gauge Steel
Comes with 60 in. Mounting rod
Antique copper Finish
Sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure easy and fluid movement
Garden Mount Only
input_text.Response A: Our Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design is a unique and elegant addition to any home or garden. It is constructed from heavy-duty 14 gauge steel for long-lasting durability, and features an antique copper finish for a timeless look. The sealed ball bearings in the wind-cup ensure smooth and effortless movement in even the slightest of breezes, making it ideal for providing highly accurate weather forecasts. This model also includes a 60 in. mounting rod for easy setup and installation. Our Garden Mount Weathervane is the perfect way to add a touch of old-world charm and beauty to your home or garden!
input_text.Response B: Our Garden Mount Weathervane, Model 9340 - Flag Design is a unique and elegant addition to any home or garden. It is constructed from heavy-duty 14 gauge steel for long-lasting durability, and features an antique copper finish for a timeless look. input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
